entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , St. Catharines
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:07 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 10:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Temperature: 2.9°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 2.8°C
Wind: WSW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to a few rain showers near midnight and ending before morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Fog patches. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 near midnight then light overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
